'''Eccentric Oni''' is [[Arataki Itto]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Itto's attire is decorated with a number of spikes and spines. He wears a cropped purple top paired with a sleeveless black collared coat decorated around the shoulders with thick purple and white ropes. He also wears a thick black belt decorated with a large buckle resembling an oni mask and grey pants decorated with red and tied at the end with ropes. His Geo [[Vision]] is on a spiked choker around his neck.
